import "./Home.css"; const Home = () => { return (
{/* HERO SECTION */}

Welcome to YogaPlanet

Step into the sacred science of self-realization

{/* INSPIRING MESSAGE */}

Yoga is not merely exercise. It is a journey inward ‚Äî from restlessness to stillness, from confusion to clarity, from limitation to liberation.

At YogaPlanet, we invite you to explore the Ocean of Yoga ‚Äî vast, timeless, and deeply transformative.

Whether you are a beginner taking your first conscious breath, or a sincere seeker walking the path for years, this space is created to guide, inspire, and uplift.

{/* QUOTE SECTION */}
‚ÄúYoga is the journey of the self, through the self, to the self.‚Äù
‚Äî Bhagavad Gƒ´tƒÅ
{/* INVITATION */}

Begin Your SƒÅdhana

Explore classical ƒÅsanas, healing therapies, pranayama, meditation, and yogic wisdom ‚Äî taught with reverence to tradition and clarity for modern life.

May your practice be steady. May your breath be deep. May your life be luminous. üïâÔ∏è

); }; export default Home;
